【考法 1】 n. 双关语： the usually humorous use of a word in such a way as to suggest two or more of its meanings or the meaning of another word similar in sound
【例】 He's a skillful pilot whose career has—no pun intended—really taken off. 她是个技术娴熟的飞行员，飞行生涯——没有别的意思——真正腾飞了。

【记】 发音象是关门声，门与门框这一双关门，叫双关
